alert.note: Alert for Meriwether; Talbot; Upson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 23 at 5:29AM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Meriwether, northwestern Upson and Talbot Counties through 600 AM EDT... At 529 AM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Olive Branch, or over Talbotton, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, up to penny sized hail and frequent cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Thomaston, Talbotton, Manchester, Woodland, Geneva, Sunset Village, Lincoln Park, The Rock, Atwater, Baughville, Olive Branch, Po Biddy Crossroads, Sprewell Bluff State Park, Crest, Pleasant Hill, Sunnyside, Hannahs Mill and Big Lazer Creek Wma. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
